thread.title: Eric Dier admits his love for a Manchester United legend made him pick No. 15 shirt at Tottenham
thread.title_full: Eric Dier admits his love for a Manchester United legend made him pick No. 15 shirt at Tottenham

author: Jake Polden
title: Eric Dier admits his love for a Manchester United legend made him pick No. 15 shirt at Tottenham
text:
Sport Eric Dier admits his love for a Manchester United legend made him pick No. 15 shirt at Tottenham The Spurs star paid close attention to a number of Manchester United greats while growing up in Portugal Share Eric Dier idolised three Man United legends growing up (Photo: Getty Images) Share Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Manchester United legend Nemanja Vidic played a huge part in Eric Dier picking the No. 15 shirt at Tottenham, according to the man himself. 
The Spurs and England international revealed he spent a lot of time watching the brave Serbian defender while growing up. 
He admitted that he liked studying Premier League players, as him and his brothers preferred English football to Portuguese, and a few stars caught his eye. 
One of these was Red Devils legend Roy Keane, who in his day was one of the club's greatest ever midfielders. Dier paid close attention to the Premier League as a young boy in Portugal (Photo: Michael Regan - The FA) Dier reveled he picked the No. 15 shirt in homage to Nemanja Vidic (Photo: REUTERS) 
The other was Vidic, who was one half of United's greatest ever centre-back pairing, alongside Rio Ferdinand. 
Speaking to the Players' Tribune, Dier said: "I was a big fan of Roy Keane when I was younger. 
"Then it was Nemanja Vidic [one of the reasons I like the No. 15] and his defensive partner, Rio Ferdinand." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
